熫字的基本解释

熫
zhì
古同“炙”。

熫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》之石切，入昔，章。］
［《廣韻》之夜切，去禡，章。］
亦作“熫1”。
(1)烤。
(2)烤熟的肉食。
(3)引申为肴馔。
(4)烧灼。
(5)曝晒。
(6)引申为照射。
(7)烘烤；烘干。
(8)熏陶；受到熏陶或教诲。
(9)中药制法之一。把药材和液汁辅料同炒，使辅料渗入药材之内。
(10)通“跖”。脚掌。

熫字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页680第39
【顏氏家訓】吳人以火旁作庶，爲炙字。

熫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
熫字的起名意思

暂无。

熫
Basic explanation of words
熫
zhì
Gu Tong "sunburn".
熫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
[The stone cut of "Guangyun", into the past, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" night cut, go to 禡, chapter. ]
Also known as "熫1".
(1) Roast.
(2) Roasted meat.
(3) The extension is delicacies.
(4) Burning.
(5) Exposure.
(6) The extension is irradiation.
(7) Baking; drying.
(8) Nurturing; being nurtured or taught.
(9) One of the preparation methods of traditional Chinese medicine. Stir-fry the medicinal materials and the juice auxiliary materials together to make the auxiliary materials penetrate into the medicinal materials.
(10) Through "plantar". Sole.
熫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熫; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 680 Page 39
[Family Instructions of Yan Family] The Wu people used the word "burn" as a concubine by the fire.
熫
